result.execSummary:
The defendant Nestor H Gomez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Narcotic Drugs, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges within 3 years (by 6-8-18) or CIVIL JUDGMENT will be entered.
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs.
Concurrent with: STRAIGHT TIME, CONCURRENT to any other sentence being served.

Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm or body armor.  Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended and he may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nestor H Gomez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Nestor H Gomez in court with attorney John J. Forrestal.  Defendant Nestor H Gomez in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

The defendant is not in compliance with the terms of the Deferred Prosecution Agreement.  Based upon the defendant's non-compliance, the court revoked the Deferred Prosecution Agreement; proceedings reinstated.  Court orders entry of judgment of conviction.

Statements made as to sentencing the state, defense, and defendant.  

Defendant sentenced to serve 6 MONTHS in the House of Correction STRAIGHT TIME, CONCURRENT to any other sentence being served.  Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges within 3 years (by 6-8-18) or CIVIL JUDGMENT will be entered.

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs.  

Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm or body armor.  Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended and he may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.

Defendant Nestor H Gomez in court with attorney John J. Forrestal.  Defendant Nestor H Gomez in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.
  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 6.
  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 8, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Nestor H Gomez in court with attorney John J. Forrestal.  Defendant Nestor H Gomez in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.

Defendant has a pending revocation.  Defense request a brief adjournment, state has no objection.  Review hearing scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Nestor H Gomez in court with attorney John J. Forrestal.  Defendant Nestor H Gomez in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.

Defendant was arrested by West Allis.  Possible new charges.  Defendant is also on a VOP hold.  State is requesting a brief adjournment for further investigation into new charges being issued.

Court ordered case adjourned for revocation and Sentencing in Branch 6.  Review hearing scheduled for March 30, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Attorney John J. Forrestal in court.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
 Defendant does not appear. Defendant is in custody pending new charges. Case is adjourned for revocation and sentencing. Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for March 2, 2015 at 10:00 am.
received and filed. lms

Defendant Nestor H Gomez in court with attorney John J. Forrestal.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.

Defendant completed residential program, has a stable residence and has tested negative.  Defendant has completed 26 hours of community service.  Review hearing scheduled for February 17, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Nestor H Gomez in court with attorney John J. Forrestal.  Brad A. Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.  Defendant completed residential program.   Defendant needs to complete community service.  Court ordered case adjourned for review hearing in Branch 6.  Review hearing scheduled for November 24, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney John J. Forrestal in court, defendant Nestor H Gomez not in court, in custody.  Brad A. Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.  Defense is requesting a PR bond.  Court orders $750.00 PR bond  Review hearing scheduled for August 26, 2014 at 08:30 am.
BAIL MOTION, received and filed. lms
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  rmm

Defendant Nestor H Gomez in court with attorney John J Forrestal.  Defendant Nestor H Gomez in custody.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Dennis Murphy.
The parties have agreed to a deferred judgment agreement.
The defendant was advised of his constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, pled GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum to Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  The parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  The Court found the defendant guilty but WITHHELD entry of Judgment of Conviction.  The court approved the Deferred Prosecution Agreement and ordered the case transferred to Judge Brostrom, Branch 6 for a review hearing on 8/26/2014 at 8:30 am.  Review hearing scheduled for August 26, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney John J Forrestal in court, defendant Nestor H Gomez not in court, in custody.  Stephan E Nolten appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Dennis Murphy.
Defense counsel has no motions to be filed.  Case adjourned for projected guilty plea on 6/4/2014 at 1:30 pm, branch 3.  Court ordered defendant to be produced for the next court date.  aw  Plea hearing scheduled for June 4, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY  to be monitored by drug testing.  Court reminds defendant to not use or possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Bail motion by defense argued and granted by the Court.

Defendant Nestor H Gomez in court with attorney John J. Forrestal.  Patricia I. Daugherty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel has received additional discovery today.  Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 4/16/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Court ordered all motions be filed by the next court date.   aw  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 16, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court.  Defense Counsel to address bail modification on the next scheduled court date.

Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original Information filed. Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pleads not guilty.

Defendant Nestor H Gomez in court with attorney John J. Forrestal.  Defendant Nestor H Gomez in custody.  Nathaniel Emery Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Konkol.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Fiorenza, Br. 03.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 2, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION INCLUDING DRUG TESTING.
   Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

ADDRESS INFO for Nestor H Gomez
Current: 1916A S PEARL ST, Milwaukee, WI 53204   (Effective: 03-13-2014)
Prior: 1003 South 10th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53204

Defendant Nestor H Gomez in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Nestor H Gomez in custody.  Lucy J. Kronforst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge KONKOL, Branch 44.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 21, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
